feed.title: Findroid Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.14.2
entry.content:
Improvements

  • Support HTML in media descriptions #713 @leekleak

Fixes

  • Library media items too small on tablet when in portrait mode #694 @peerless2012

Translations

  • Chinese (Simplified) @lzyhenniu
  • Chinese (Traditional) @lzyhenniu
  • French @PierreKy-org
  • German @Panda260 @TotalLiberation
  • Hungarian @Zan1456
  • Portuguese @chrisbehectik
  • Spanish (Mexico) @newton181
  • Turkish @NukeSource

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.15.0 - Jellyfin 10.9
entry.content:
New features

  • Login disclaimer support #721 @leekleak
  • Native 10.9 trickplay #763 @jarnedemeulemeester
  • New intro skipper implementation #633 @cd16b @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Includes skipping credits
  • Use jumoog's intro skipper
  • Display trickplay during seek gesture #635 @cd16b

Improvements

  • Jellyfin 10.9 support #757 @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Update mpvlib @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Update mpv to 0.38.0 and other dependency updates
  • Various dependecy updates which include fixes and performance improvements @jarnedemeulemeester

Fixes

  • Some languages are displayed incorrectly in the track selector @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Sort TV shows by date played #741 @Hjaelp

Translations

  • Arabic @nomadics9
  • Bulgarian @g8row
  • Danish @xxzp3
  • Dutch @r3ps4J
  • French @suyashmahar
  • Hindi @suyashmahar
  • Polish @Bryla2507
  • Portuguese (Brazil) @Uncle-Tio @rogeriomendes
  • Slovak @adiskill

Notes

  • Target Android 15 (SDK 35)
  • Minimum Jellyfin support 10.9.0

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.15.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fix mpv crash when starting playback @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix language code mapping when passing for mpv @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Add error handling to trickplay images @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix navigation crashes when rapidly tapping items @Natanel-Shitrit
  • Fix mpv crash when leaving the player @jarnedemeulemeester

Translations

  • Hungarian @Zan1456
  • Polish @NeroPcStation
  • Spanish @MrOscarvs

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.15.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fix a crash when failing to load the login disclaimer @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Hide the system bars when closing a dialog on Android 10 and lower @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Fix items rearranging when scrolling in a large library @jarnedemeulemeester

Translations

  • Danish @xxzp3
  • Italian @cd16b
  • Korean @KimPig

Other

  • Make builds reproducible @jarnedemeulemeester

entry.title: New release for Findroid: v0.15.3
entry.content:
Improvements

  • Update mpv to 0.39.0 @jarnedemeulemeester
  • Play H.266 (VVC) content using mpv
